name: @vibenv/env-manager
description: Interactive environment variable manager for vibenv packages

scripts.postbuild: (head -n1 dist/envManager.js | grep -q '#!/usr/bin/env node') || (echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' | cat - dist/envManager.js > temp.js && mv temp.js dist/envManager.js) && chmod +x dist/envManager.js

author: Martin Velinsky <martin@elinsky.name>
